name: the last hope (itch) (xoziak)
description:
defend the last base of humanity from zombies attack.

controls:

WASD   OR  arrows key => move

left click => select fighter to move

left ctrl + left click => select multi-fighters to move

right click => cancel all fighters selection

E => gain fps control to one fighter
